query:
SELECT gl.*, l.nome as lojaNome, u.name as gestorNome
FROM gestor_lojas gl 
JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id 
JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id 
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Rui%' OR u.email LIKE '%rui%'
ORDER BY gl.createdAt DESC;
